dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Hey, I'm new around here. How's it going?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Oh, hey! I'm doing alright, just getting ready for some group activities. What about you?

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm supposed to be doing something with the group too. What role do you think you'll play in it?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Eh, it doesn't matter to me. I'm just in it for the fun.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Alright, cool. Have you read the book we're supposed to discuss for the group activity?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Nah, I didn't bother. I'm not really into reading.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Okay, no worries. Did you bring a book to class today?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Nah, I didn't bring one. I'd rather play games than do group activities.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: But, um, the teacher gave us homework to do together.

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Even if I don't do it, there are plenty of other people who can do it for me. I'm gonna play instead.
